description: Vehicle_position: a surface movement position report from a ground vehicle (non-aircraft)

type.description: Message type: Value is always vehicle_position

ident.description: Flight Identifier: Callsign identifying the flight. Typically, ICAO airline code plus IATA/ticketing flight number, or the aircraft registration. May sometimes be "Unknown-XXXXX" if not known.

airport.description: Airport: The ICAO code of the airport the position is associated with.

lat.description: Latitude: In decimal degrees, rounded to 4 decimal points

lon.description: Longitude: In decimal degrees, rounded to 4 decimal points

clock.description: Report Time: POSIX epoch format. Time should be the time generated by flight hardware if possible

id.description: Surface ID: Each discernible track will have a FlightAware-created unique track ID that will last from the time the target is first seen until a period of time has elapsed without receiving any new positions for or from the target, currently ten minutes.

updateType.description: Update Type: Specifies source of message, A for ADS-B, X for ASDE-X

pitr.description: Point In Time Recovery: Timestamp value that should be supplied to the "pitr" connection initiation command when reconnecting and you wish to resume firehose playback at that approximate position

air_ground.description: Air/Ground: Air/Ground or Weight-on-Wheel (WOW) switch... "A" air, "G" ground. (Will typically be "G" for ground_positions, but switch confusion may sometimes indicate otherwise.)

facility_hash.description: Reporting facility hash: A consistent and unique obfuscated identifier string for each source reporting positions to FlightAware

facility_name.description: Reporting facility name: A description of the reporting facility intended for end-user consumption. May be a blank string if undefined.

alt.description: Altitude: In feet (MSL). Will generally be very close to airport surface elevation.

squawk.description: Transponder squawk code: 4 digit octal transponder beacon code assigned by ATC

hexid.description: Transponder Mode S code: 24-bit Mode S transponder code assigned by aircraft registrar. Formatted in upper case hexadecimal

reg.description: Aircraft Registration: The tail number or registration of the aircraft, if known and it differs from the ident.

aircrafttype.description: Aircraft Equipment Type: ICAO aircraft type code, as determined from registration information looked up using the transponder's hexid.

manual_aircrafttype.description: Aircraft Equipment Type: ICAO aircraft type code, as manually entered by ATC. Sometimes "VEH" for vehicles.

track.description: Track Identifier: For ASDE-X, a track ID that should be temporally unique to this track but can roll over or restart.

vertRate.description: Vertical Rate: In feet per minute. number is positive if ascending; negative if descending

baroAlt.description: Barometric Pressure Altitude: Most recent barometric pressure altitude reported by the aircraft (uncorrected).  204775 means >= 204775

fix.description: Fix: For departing flights will generally be first three characters of the departure fix, or the ICAO four-letter airport name for arrival flights

altSource.description: Altitude Source: is "FL" if the altitude source variable was derived from flightLevel reported by ASDE-X.

arrival.description: Arrival: Set as 1 only when an ASDE-X ground status of "arrival" is received in the upstream message

onground.description: On Ground: Set as 1 only when an ASDE-X ground status of "onground" is received in the upstream message

on_runway.description: On Runway: If aircraft is on a runway, populated with the runway identifier

layer.description: Geospatial Layer: If not present or empty, aircraft is within the airport boundary.  If set to near, aircraft is within 5 miles of the airport center point, at a groundspeed over 100knots and at an altitude less than or equal to 5000 feet above the airport's published elevation

airport_location.description: Airport Location: Aircraft position if within a defined location boundary (such as "Atlantic Aviation", "Signature Flight Support (West)", "Customs Ramp")

airport_location_id.description: Airport Location Id: A consistent and unique obfuscated identifier string for each location
